## Before Submitting

Please check the following before submitting a feature request:

- [ ] I have searched [existing issues](../../issues) to ensure this feature hasn't been requested
- [ ] I have checked the [README](../../README.md) command tables to see if this is already planned
- [ ] I have reviewed [open PRs](../../pulls) to see if someone is already working on this
